name: A Creature Connection
description:
Prototype, changes may be made!! 

Made using GameMaker Studio 2.

Play as a human trying to communicate with an alien at a party. But how will you know what is socially acceptable? Will you make a connection?

Credits

Made by Emelie Almroth, Moa Bruus and Maya Sidén

Sound: "Ding" - Aiwha https://freesound.org/people/Aiwha/sounds/196106/

Music: "Cool Catz" - TeknoAxe https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n_xoXjoIXW4&list=PL904AuFDEgeiemhjt63xj53gLojiTz9hg&index=9
